title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 2 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 2 2021
description:
Down to the wire of the VA governor's race and the rallying cry across the nation. Colin Kaepernick demonstrates how wokeness robs the brain. Climate change is a globalist religion and blah, blah, blah. And Florida Governor Ron DeSantis talks jabs and jobs, governing without fear, supporting law enforcement, and thoughts on CRT and education. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
